snippet: In an address marking the second anniversary of the uprising in Syria, the rebel commander reminded viewers that “the Syrian revolution started peacefully.”
abstract: In an address marking the second anniversary of the uprising in Syria, the rebel commander reminded viewers that “the Syrian revolution started peacefully.”

headline.main: Remembering the Start of Syria's Uprising
